basic.description: A survey of organic functional group reactivity from a mechanistic perspective, including substitution, addition, elimination, rearrangement and redox reactions; extensive use of examples from industrial process chemistry. The laboratory provides experience in organic synthesis, including the preparation, purification and characterization of organic compounds. NOTE: Laboratory consumables: estimated cost $20. (0/38/0/16/0)
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Applied Organic Chemistry I

extra.enrollment_requirement: EXCLUSION: CHEM223.  A Prerequisite of CHEM211 and CHEM212 and registration in a BSCE Academic Program.
